CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 5, 1953, p.5, reads: "DISTRICT FIRES ROUT FAMILIES - ...A 2 1/2 year old baby playing near a room heater touched off a two-alarm fire which drove five families from a triplex house at 1838-40-42 Bedford Avenue (right) Sunday evening and did an estimated damage of $3,500."
TitMainTitle: Three brick row houses with fire damage, including missing roof, broken windows, debris on sidewalk, and sign on building on left reads "Cement and Repair Work", 1800 block of Bedford Avenue, Hill District
